scripts.test: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test:docker: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run test:all:docker
scripts.test:update: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run test:all:update
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:feature
scripts.test:all:docker: npm run test:unit && npm run test:feature:docker
scripts.test:all:update: npm run test:unit:update && npm run test:feature:update
scripts.test:feature: NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-test PORT=3001 concurrently --names 'server,test' 'NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm start -- --port ${PORT}' 'wait-for-localhost ${PORT} && npm run test:feature:noserver' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:docker: PORT=3001 concurrently --names 'docker,test' 'docker run --rm --publish ${PORT}:3000 ${TEST_DOCKER_IMAGE}' 'wait-for-localhost ${PORT} && npm run test:feature:noserver' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:update: NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-test PORT=3001 concurrently --names 'server,test' 'NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm start -- --port ${PORT}' 'wait-for-localhost ${PORT} && npm run test:feature:noserver -- --updateSnapshot' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:watch: NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-test PORT=3001 concurrently --names 'server,test' 'NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm start -- --port ${PORT}' 'wait-for-localhost ${PORT} && npm run test:feature:noserver -- --watch' --kill-others --success first
